Description: Rim sherd of very large North Ionian pottery plate; orange clay with some white inclusions and silver mica; cream slip; exterior glazed underside of rim, top of wall reserved with black band; interior: one vertical and part of one horizontal palmette with filling ornament of half-roundels.
Bibliographic references: Villing et al 2013-2015 / Naukratis: Greeks in Egypt (GG.762)
